definition: to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: It is a long-standing problem in hospital management on professional caregivers.
sentences.chinese: 医院职业陪护一直是医院管理中的老大难问题。

sentences.english: Because his parents chaperoned him once too.
sentences.chinese: 因为他的父母也曾经陪护过他一次。

sentences.english: Are there any escort services that don’t peddle sex?
sentences.chinese: 那么究竟有没有不兜售性服务的陪护呢？

sentences.english: Drug users may also hire escorts to accompany them while they get high.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒的人或许还会在亢奋后租用陪护人员来看护他们。
